sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './../../support/css/profilenasabahdetail.css' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from 'reactstrap'; import Moment from 'react-moment'; import BrokenLink from './../../support/img/default.png' import Loader from 'react-loader-spinner' import {getProfileNasabahDetailFunction} from './saga' import { getToken } from '../index/token'; import { getBankDetailFunction } from '../mitra/saga'; import {decryptImage} from '../global/globalFunction' class profileNasabahDetail extends React.Component{ state={rows:[],modalKTP:false,modalNPWP:false,npwp:0,ktp:0,gambarKTP:null,gambarNPWP:null, bankID:0,bankName:'',diKlik:false,progress:true,errorMessage:''} _isMounted = false componentDidMount(){ this.getDataDetail() this._isMounted = true } // decryptImage = (text,stringStates)=>{ // let keyStr = "BpLnfgDsc3WD9F3qap394rjd239smsdk" // const contents = Buffer.from(text, 'base64'); // const iv = contents.slice(0, 16); // const textBytes = contents.slice(16); // const decipher = crypto.createDecipheriv(algorithm, keyStr, iv); // let res = decipher.update(textBytes, '', 'utf8'); // res += decipher.final('utf8'); // this.setState({[stringStates]:res}) // } componentWillUnmount(){ this._isMounted = false } getDataDetail = async function () { const param = { id:this.props.match.params.id } const data = await getProfileNasabahDetailFunction(param) if(data){ if(!data.error){ this.setState({rows:data.data,ktp:data.data.idcard_image,npwp:data.data.taxid_image, bankID:data.data.bank.Int64}, ()=>{ //KTP WAJIB KALO NPWP OPTIONAL this.getBankName() }) }else{ this.setState({errorMessage:data.error}) } } } getBankName = async function(){ const param = { id:this.state.bankID } const data = await getBankDetailFunction(param) if(data){ if(!data.error){ this.setState({bankName:data.name,progress:false}) }else{ this.setState({errorMessage:data.error,progress:false}) } } return this.state.bankName } formatMoney=(number)=> { return number.toLocaleString('in-RP', {style : 'currency', currency: 'IDR'})} btnModalKTP =()=>{ this.setState({modalKTP:true}) } btnModalNPWP =()=>{ this.setState({modalNPWP:true}) } btnModalCancelKTP=()=>{ this.setState({modalKTP:false}) } btnModalCancelNPWP=()=>{ this.setState({modalNPWP:false}) } render(){ if (this.state.progress){ return (
) }else{ if(this.state.diKlik){ return( ) } if(getToken()){ return(
{/* ------------------------------------------------------FOTO KTP------------------------------------------------------ */} KTP Detail {this.state.ktp && this.state.ktp.length === 0 ?"Gambar KTP Tidak ada": { e.target.attributes.getNamedItem("src").value = BrokenLink }} src={`${decryptImage(this.state.ktp)}`}> } {/* ------------------------------------------------------FOTO NPWP------------------------------------------------------ */} NPWP Detail {this.state.npwp && this.state.npwp.length===0 ?"Gambar NPWP Tidak ada": { e.target.attributes.getNamedItem("src").value = BrokenLink }} src={`${decryptImage(this.state.npwp)}`}>}

Nasabah - Detail

{this.state.errorMessage}
{/* =========================================FIRST================================ */}
Id Nasabah : {this.state.rows.id} Rekening Pinjaman : {this.state.rows.bank_accountnumber} Status Nasabah : {this.state.rows.loan_status ==="inactive"?"Tidak Aktif":"Aktif"}
Mitra Nasabah : {this.state.bankName} Pinjaman ke- : {this.state.rows.loan_count} Tanggal Register :
Kategori Pinjaman : {this.state.rows.category ==="account_executive"?"Account Executive" : this.state.rows.category === "agent"?"Agent":"Personal"} Agen/AE : {this.state.rows.agent_name ===""?"-":this.state.rows.agent_name} ( {this.state.rows.agent_provider_name ===""?"-":this.state.rows.agent_provider_name} )
{/* ==============================SECOND===================================== */}
Informasi Pribadi
Nama: {this.state.rows.fullname}
Jenis Kelamin: {this.state.rows.gender}
No KTP: {this.state.rows.idcard_number}
No NPWP: {this.state.rows.taxid_number}
Email: {this.state.rows.email}
Tanggal Lahir: {String(this.state.rows.birthday).substr(0, String(this.state.rows.birthday).indexOf('T'))}
Tempat Lahir: {this.state.rows.birthplace}
Pendidikan: {this.state.rows.last_education}
Nama Ibu Kandung: {this.state.rows.mother_name}
No HP: {this.state.rows.phone}
Status Pernikahan: {this.state.rows.marriage_status}
Nama Pasangan: {this.state.rows.marriage_status==="Menikah"?this.state.rows.spouse_name:"-"}
Tanggal lahir Pasangan: {this.state.rows.marriage_status==="Menikah"?String(this.state.rows.spouse_birthday).substr(0, String(this.state.rows.spouse_birthday).indexOf('T')):"-"}
Pendidikan Pasangan: {this.state.rows.marriage_status==="Menikah"?this.state.rows.spouse_lasteducation:"-"}
Tanggungan (Orang): { this.state.rows.dependants > 5?"Lebih dari 5":this.state.rows.dependants}
{/* ==============================THIRD===================================== */}
Data Tempat Tinggal
Alamat: {this.state.rows.address}
Provinsi: {this.state.rows.province}
Kota: {this.state.rows.city}
RT/ RW: {this.state.rows.neighbour_association}/{this.state.rows.hamlets}
No Telp Rumah: {this.state.rows.home_phonenumber}
Kecamatan: {this.state.rows.subdistrict}
Kelurahan: {this.state.rows.urban_village}
Status Tempat Tinggal: {this.state.rows.home_ownership}
Lama Menempati Rumah: {this.state.rows.lived_for} Tahun
{/* ==============================FOURTH===================================== */}
Info Pekerjaan
Jenis Pekerjaan: {this.state.rows.occupation}
No Induk Pegawai: {this.state.rows.employee_id}
Nama Instansi: {this.state.rows.employer_name}
Alamat Kantor: {this.state.rows.employer_address}
Jabatan: {this.state.rows.department}
Lama Bekerja (Tahun): {this.state.rows.been_workingfor}
Nama Atasan: {this.state.rows.direct_superiorname}
No Tlp Kantor: {this.state.rows.employer_number}
Gaji (Perbulan): {this.state.rows.monthly_income ? this.formatMoney(parseInt(this.state.rows.monthly_income)): 0}
Pendapatan Lain: {this.state.rows.other_income?this.formatMoney(parseInt(this.state.rows.other_income)):0}
Sumber Lain: {this.state.rows.other_incomesource}
{/* ==============================FIFTH===================================== */}
Lain - Lain
Nama Orang Tidak Serumah yang bisa di hubungi: {this.state.rows.related_personname}
Hubungan: {this.state.rows.related_relation}
Alamat Rumah: {this.state.rows.related_address}
No Telp Rumah: {this.state.rows.related_homenumber}
No HP: {this.state.rows.related_phonenumber}
this.setState({diKlik:true})}>
) } } if(!getToken()){ return ( ) } } } const mapStateToProp = (state)=>{ return{ name:state.user.name } } export default connect(mapStateToProp) (profileNasabahDetail);
